# Flying, Improved (Ring)
## Overview
**Aura** moderate transmutation; **CL** 7th

**Slot** ring

**Price** 10,000 gp; Weight –

**Description**

As a *[[Flying (Ring)|ring of flying]]*, except it grants a +10 competence bonus on its wearer’s [[Fly (Skill)|Fly]] checks.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Forge Ring (Feat)|Forge Ring]], creator must have 10 ranks in the [[Fly (Skill)|Fly]] skill

**Cost** 5,000 gp

**Source:** Midgard Campaign Setting (Open Design), pg. 122
